vehicle:
</s>A Great Love Is a Wide-Open Space

A great love is a wide-open space. It is a feeling of being at one with another person, of being at peace with the world, of feeling as if you are the only two people in the universe. It is a sense of expansion, of expansion of the self, of expansion of the heart. It is a feeling of oneness, of oneness with nature, of oneness with all of creation.
